<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'I'll not last long if...if help cannot be found for me. Fortunately, I know of something which may be of aid. There are bushes which grow in the vale just north-east of Frerin's Court called nestadalas.

'Venture out north-east of Frerin's Court and gather up leaves from these bushes. They are said to have healing properties. They may well be my only chance.

'Now make haste and do not get lost!'
'Good, good. Just the smell of these leaves is helping to ease the pain. Now I will tell you what I know!'
'Do you have the leaves of the nestadalas-bush yet? They are found north-east of Frerin's Court.'
Bolli needs the fronds of the nestadalas-bush to purge himself of the poison the Dourhands gave him.
Nestedelais can be found to the north-east of Frerin's Court.\n\nBolli mentioned that the leaves of the nestadalas-bush were necessary for his cure and asked you to gather some fronds for him.
